content.question: Assume that the  int  variable  val  has been declared and initialized with a value that satisfies the precondition of the method. Which of the following best describes the value, if any, returned by the call  what(val)?

choices.label: The number of digits in  val
The sum of the digits in  val
Nothing is returned. A run-time error occurs because of infinite recursion.

content.answer: The number of digits in  val

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
